notesStmt.note: Folio 154r: the names of the signs of zodiac and seven planets in Hebrew and Latin. Folio 155v-156r: a list of books in a late Italian cursive script.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 280: his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 through Asher & Co., Berlin dealer to the British Museum 1841-1853: inscribed, folio [158v] (fse002v).
